import { toast } from "react-hot-toast"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import {add ,remove} from "../redux/Slices/CartSlice"; const Product = (post) =>{ console.log("This is product page") console.log(post); const {cart} = useSelector((state) => state); const dispatch = useDispatch(); return(

{post.post.title}

{post.post.description.split(" ").slice(0,10).join(" ")+"..."}

${post.post.price}

{ cart.some( (p)=> p.id == post.id ) ? () : () }
); } export default Product;
